main event: Several sightings of unidentified flying objects were reported in Wurtland, Kentucky, on April 8, 1962, with various witnesses describing them over different times and conditions.
interesting points: Multiple witnesses, including Mr. and Mrs. Chester D. Caudill and Sgt. C.J. Munz, reported seeing bright and round lights in the sky., Object sighting by Sgt. Munz included a metallic construction and an estimated size of 40-50 feet in diameter., The objects were observed hovering and then moving rapidly at high speeds up to 600 mph., One sighting lasted approximately 3 hours with intervals of the object disappearing and reappearing., Clear sky conditions were reported during the sightings.
sighted object: bright round lights in the sky
witness description: Mr. and Mrs. Chester D. Caudill, Sgt. C.J. Munz
